TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 、 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指標位於控制項上方時，使用者按下滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over a control. 事件發生於使用者放開滑鼠按鈕時，指標都是在控制項上方時。The event occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer remains over the control. 事件發生於使用者將滑鼠指標移至控制項上方時。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over a control. A指定哪個滑鼠按鈕按下時，多少次按下並釋放滑鼠按鈕的滑鼠和滑鼠滾輪移動的數量的參數。A specifies which mouse button is pressed, how many times the mouse button was pressed and released, the coordinates of the mouse, and the amount the mouse wheel moved. 可接收沒有相對應的事件，如果使用者會將焦點切換到另一個應用程式，再鬆開滑鼠按鈕。It is possible to receive a event without a corresponding , if the user switches focus to another application before releasing the mouse button. 這三個事件存在， ，和類別。These three events exist for the , , and classes. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理上的事件控制項，以便按一下滑鼠右鍵選取控制項中的所有文字。The following code examples handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制項，名為`textBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control that is named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用`Location`追蹤屬性按下滑鼠左的按鈕的而且要繪製的直線線段的一系列以回應使用者輸入。The following code example uses the `Location` property to track clicks of the left mouse button and to draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 此範例不會不重新繪製直線，如果您隱藏表單，然後再重新顯示;為了簡單起見已省略此程式碼。The example does not redraw the lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code has been omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例會使用並屬性，以顯示目前在滑鼠指標位置視窗。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理上的事件控制項，以便按一下滑鼠右鍵選取控制項中的所有文字。The following code example handles the event on a control so that clicking the right mouse button selects all the text in the control. 此範例中，您需要包含表單的表單控制項，名為`textBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `textBox1`. summary.span: 取得按下並釋放滑鼠鍵的次數。

span.span: Gets the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.

span.span: An that contains the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然 Windows 介面會定義標準滑鼠事件成為在按一下或按兩下，個別的應用程式可以解譯為單一事件大量的點擊次數。Although the Windows interface defines standard mouse events as either single-clicks or double-clicks, individual applications can interpret a larger number of clicks as a single event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得滑鼠滾輪滾動時帶有正負號的刻度數乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常數。

span.span: Gets a signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

summary.span: 一個刻度是一個滑鼠滾輪的刻痕。

span.span: A detent is one notch of the mouse wheel.

value.span: 滑鼠滾輪滾動時帶有正負號的刻度數乘以 WHEEL_DELTA 常數。

span.span: A signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠滾輪組合滾輪的滑鼠按鈕的功能。The mouse wheel combines the features of a wheel and a mouse button. 滾輪具有離散、 平均間隔的色塊。The wheel has discrete, evenly spaced notches. 當旋轉滾輪時，會發現每一波陷傳送滾輪訊息。When you rotate the wheel, a wheel message is sent as each notch is encountered. 一個滾輪波陷，一個刻度時，會定義滾動，這是 120。One wheel notch, a detent, is defined by the windows constant WHEEL_DELTA, which is 120. 正值表示滾輪 （遠離使用者）; 已向前旋轉負值表示滾輪 （朝向使用者） 已向後旋轉。A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward (away from the user); a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward (toward the user). 目前，值為 120 是一個刻度的標準。Currently, a value of 120 is the standard for one detent. 如果較高的解析度 mice 現已引進，WHEEL_DELTA 的定義可能會變小。If higher resolution mice are introduced, the definition of WHEEL_DELTA might become smaller. 大部分的應用程式應該檢查正數或負數值，而不是彙總的總計。Most applications should check for a positive or negative value rather than an aggregate total. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#54)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#54)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As Point

summary.span: 取得滑鼠在產生滑鼠事件期間的位置。

span.span: Gets the location of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: ，包含 X 及 Y 滑鼠座標 (以像素為單位)，這是相對於表單左上角的位置。

span.span: A that contains the x- and y- mouse coordinates, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the form.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤滑鼠左鍵按下滑鼠，並繪製的直線線段的一系列以回應使用者輸入的屬性。The following code example uses the property to track left mouse clicks and draw a series of straight line segments in response to user input. 此範例不會保存繪製的直線，如果您隱藏表單，然後再重新顯示;為了簡單起見，省略了這段程式碼。The example does not persist the drawn lines if you hide the form and then redisplay it; this code was omitted for simplicity. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Windows Forms Coordinates

related.span: Windows Form 中的滑鼠事件

span.span: Mouse Events in Windows Forms

summary.span: 取得滑鼠在產生滑鼠事件期間的 X 座標。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.

value.span: 滑鼠的 X 座標 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠座標異所引發的事件。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，當處理事件、 滑鼠座標值是相對於引發事件之控制項的座標。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 拖放作業相關的某些事件具有相關聯的滑鼠座標是相對於表單原點或螢幕的原點的值。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse-coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用並屬性，以顯示目前在滑鼠指標位置視窗。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. [!code-csharp[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MouseEventArgs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MouseEventArgs/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠座標異所引發的事件。The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised. 例如，當處理事件、 滑鼠座標值是相對於引發事件之控制項的座標。For example, when the event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event. 拖放作業相關的某些事件具有相關聯的滑鼠座標值，以相對於表單原點或螢幕的原點。Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用並屬性，以顯示目前在滑鼠指標位置視窗。The following code example uses the and properties to display the current position of the mouse pointer in a window. 若要使用此程式碼，呼叫`TrackCoordinates`從表單的建構函式。To use this code, call `TrackCoordinates` from the form constructor.
